c74object.name: alligatorNoteLooper
c74object.description: Note looper specifically designed to work with voice-alligator. Remembers glide notes as well as microtonal pitches.

inlet.digest: gets data from voice-alligator, sets methods

inlet.description: auxilary input for parameter recording, The parameters that are recorded here will get the stream number prepended

outlet.digest: sends recorded data back to voice-alligator
outlet.description: sends recorded data back to voice-alligator and append a stream number and a recorded frequency
sends recorded parameter data back out and prepends the stream number

objarg.name: stream
objarg.description: sets which stream the looper will output to (default 2)

method.name: record
method.description: record 1 / 0: starts or stops recording. if notes where recorded, go into play mode

attribute.name: speed
attribute.digest: sets the playback speed as ratio (default 1.)
attribute.description: sets the playback speed as ratio (default 1.)

attribute.name: recordPressed
attribute.digest: transform pressed notes into note-ons on record start
attribute.description: if a note was pressed when record is set to 1, this decides if the note will be transformed into a note-on on loop start. this makes timing a loop easier.

attribute.name: vol
attribute.description: multiplies recorded velocities by given percentage

attribute.name: volJitter
attribute.digest: volume jitter of ouput as percentage
attribute.description: manipulates recorded velocities by substracting given percentage from them

attribute.name: pitchJitter
attribute.digest: pitch jitter of output as semitones
attribute.description: transposes the recorded notes randomly by given number (in positive and negative direction)
